Text.val: 12.09.2011 SH SCR16636 Changed output parameters to get rid of
reloading changed CLAC variables in OMQ059PS
09.02.2011 GB SCR16202 Changed condition for calculation the Sum (INVO_AACTUALC)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALC <> 0 and :4 and INVO_DEBH_NO = 1 for fetch only
